description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character fights an Elite-Level or Master-Level Foe in hand-to-hand combat during a mission unaided and wins. Once per Encounter when the character kills an Elite or Master Level foe who is in charge of a group or formation of enemies, all subordinates of the slain foe who witness them die must make a -20 Willpower Test (Orks do not apply their Mob Rule Trait to this test), any that fail suffers -10 to all Tests for the remainder of the encounter, shaken by the death of their leader.
